website_summaries.verdict: Buyers looking for a cheaper set of club chairs will appreciate this supremely comfortable pair.
pros: Simple design can work well in any space
Buyers were thrilled by the quality of these chairs
cons: Cushion colors can fade in the sunlight over time

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to purchase these because of the great price, but let me tell you that I was pleasantly surprised. Great quality, very easy to assemble and they look more than amazing!!!! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing....quality of the wood
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this set....It was exactly what I was looking for....when they arrived, we had to put it together, which was not hard...the white cushions are beautiful and very comfortable....I had this set less than a year and the wood starting falling apart, literally the set looks 10 years old....and the cushions stayed beautiful...I wrote to the seller and hoping to hear back with a replacement chairs....If you are looking for a set to use for 3-6 months and throw it out....this is great for that....great look but very poor quality wood.
customer_reviews.author: JCJ

customer_reviews.title: Great chair - ok cushions.
customer_reviews.text: We have had these chairs for more than a year now - they are fantastic. In fact, I came back to Amazon today to see if we could get some replacement cushions because they are so dingy and gross they are nearly unusable. I wish they sold the cushions or even the covers separately but it looks like we will have to have a custom set made. I give the chairs 4.5 stars because they are sturdy I just wish there was more thought into sustainability.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Futrell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Cushions are a bit stiff but it holds my 260 lb ass very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Seating
customer_reviews.text: It looks great on my lani, the cusions are firm but thicker than I had on a prior set, I expect them to be more comfortable and wear well. Set was easy to assemble with 2 people working together. it would be more difficult, but not impossible for one person. I did one chair alone, I'm 65 yo female, and husband helped with 2nd. First chair took longer but there was no debate about right or wrong methods. 2nd chair took less time but was more aggravating!
customer_reviews.author: 4dognight

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs, good value.
customer_reviews.text: Lots to like here: the seat cushions are firm and thick, Velcro fasteners on both top and bottom cushions to hold in place, sturdy, easy to assemble, look good and the price is very reasonable. The charcoal grey is perfect for me and I added some decorative pillows for a pop of color. Also, the packing was excellent -- everything well protected and kept in place.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I wished the coffee table was bigger and wish I could seat more people. A bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: I love this outdoors conversation set. This is exactly how you see it on Amazon. I wish I could give it 5 stars but the only problem the coffee table is a bit to small. It looks bigger in the picture, other than great quality and a bit pricey . I am saving money to buy 2 more chairs. I need a discount from the seller to buy 2 more chairs. I will definitely buy this outdoor set again. I love it, love it, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: fernande simeon

customer_reviews.title: excellent material, the ordered just as i told got ...
customer_reviews.text: My patio furniture it is gorgeous, excellent material, the ordered just as i told got on time despite of hurricane. It is very easy to put together, clear direction how to ensemble and i love it. I highly recommended the Parma outdoor patio furniture. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: This set is amazing. Fits perfect and the adjustable feet are a ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing. Fits perfect and the adjustable feet are a very nice touch. Nobody hates more than a piece of furniture that bounds around while sitting in it! But buy buy. Btw, everything shown was purchased through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: The furniture is beautiful, easy to put together and very solid. Looks and feels as nice as pieces costing 4x as much. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Minor quality issues but company is great to work with!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed to unwrap the box and find a broken piece on the coffee table. However customer service contacted me immediately and are sending me replacement parts. I have constructed the love seat and single chairs and they are easy to put together and feel quite sturdy. The cushions are quite stiff but I see that as a positive as I feel they should hold up better over time.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Muratore

customer_reviews.title: Color fades quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these chairs for about 3 - 4 weeks. The seating material has faded significantly so they almost look like a different color chair. We purchased the rust colored chairs and they now look like a salmon/dark pink color. Not sure what another 6 months is going to do :(.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great look!
customer_reviews.text: 2 chairs came broken, but we were able to assemble anyways. We really love them! Definitely a great addition to the back patio.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: great chairs
customer_reviews.text: We love them! Easy to put together. Comfy. I was concerned the backs would be too short, but because of the angle, they're perfect! Cushions are firm and comfortable. Height of chair is a little lower than first expected, but it's great too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Classy Mid-Century Style Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. These chairs look great on the front porch of my midcentury home.
customer_reviews.author: John John

customer_reviews.title: Patio furniture looks great and just as it does in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Patio furniture looks great and just as it does in the picture. It is very comfortable and definitely worth the price​.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged (boxes are heavy). Easy to asssemble. Study construction. Comfortable. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DPW

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and sturdy chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Just received and assembled 4 of these chairs. Easy to assemble; gorgeous and sturdy and seems to be well built. Cushions are firm which makes for a very comfortable seat. Very pleased with the apparent quality and style! Hope they hold up well over time and when exposed to rain and heat. If they do, then this will be quite the find - a way to avoid spending the $700-1,100 per chair that teak lounge chairs cost.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Barilla

customer_reviews.title: Good looking chairs/Professional company
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these chairs. They look great on the deck of our beach house. They were very easy to put together, and seem sturdy. Unfortunately, a couple of pieces came damaged for one of the chairs, but I got a quick response from the company, and new parts are being shipped. The company has been very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R Fisher

customer_reviews.title: The seat cushions are nicely made and table is a perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was a project to assemble but once completed it looks gorgeous on the patio. The seat cushions are nicely made and table is a perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these chairs. I did buy covers to help stopping them fade but for the price they have been the best buy yet for my balcony
customer_reviews.author: MIAGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs look great. They are very comfortable and putting them together was very easy. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Henry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and looks!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent and the looks are very modern and expensive. Amazing, considering the price!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I got the blue cushions, great color. Cushions are extra firm, but do sit well.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Higgins

customer_reviews.title: These chairs were a great purchase. They look great
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were a great purchase. They look great, seem to be solidly built, and are a lovely alternative to wicker which dominates the market.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the sectional I bought... super heavy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jill.V

product_meta.title: Parma Outdoor Acacia Wood Club Chairs with Cushions (Set of 2), Teak and Beige
product_meta.description:
Size:Set of Two Chairs| Color:BeigeYour outdoor space will thank you for this set of club chairs that brings you both comfort and refreshing style. Made with a gorgeous acacia wood frame, these chairs are a sturdy addition to your backyard or patio that also offers a rich, natural look. The plush cushions help provide long-lasting comfort, so you can spend all day outside under the warm summer sun. Whether you are curling up with a good book or engaging in casual conversation, our set of club chairs will make sure you are as comfortable as you can be. 

 * Includes: Two (2) Club Chairs
 * Frame Material: Acacia Wood
 * Cushion Material: Water-Resistant Fabric
 * Fabric Composition: 100% Polyester
 * Frame Finish: Teak
 * Cushion Color: Beige
 * Hand-Crafted Details
 * Assembly Required
 * Product Dimensions: 31.00 inches deep x 29.00 inches wide x 27.25 inches high
 * Seat Dimensions: 22.75 inches deep x 22.75 inches wide x 12.50 inches high
 * Arm Height: 20.50 inches high
 *
feature_bullets: ACACIA WOOD: Made with acacia wood that brings a sleek and exotic look to your space, this durable hardwood naturally withstands outdoor elements and will not darken over time. Acacia wood is perfect as a solid, heavy frame that resists wear and tear.

WATER-RESISTANT CUSHIONS: Our cushions are covered with a non-porous material that makes cleaning any spill a breeze. Please note that these cushions are water-resistant and not waterproof. Please do not submerge in water.

PLUSH CUSHIONS WITH TIES: With plush seating, these chairs are designed for your comfort. The thick seat and back cushions will wow you and your friends with the level of coziness this seating provides. These can be fastened to the frame of the chair using build-in loop and hook fasteners.

DIMENSIONS: Choose an accessory that is the perfect size for you and your furniture. This club chair is 31.00” W x 29.00” D x 27.25” H. You will love how much your space can transform with the simple addition of this charming chair.
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Some assembly is required for this club chair. All of the instructions and tools needed for assembly are included. This comes as a set of two.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars13 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
